otherNames: Uchuu Kaizoku Captain Herlock, 宇宙海賊・キャプテンハーロック
synopsis: The year is 2977. Mankind has become complacent and stagnant. All work is done by machines, while humans spend all their time on entertainment. But when a mysterious invader from the stars catches Earth unawares, only the legendary space pirate Captain Harlock and the crew of the Arcadia have the will to stand against them.
